name: Simone & Simaria
description: '''Simone & Simaria''' (sometimes written as '''Simone e Simaria''') was  a Brazilian musical duo consisting of sisters Simone Mendes Rocha Diniz (born 24 May 1984 in [[Uibaí]]) and Simaria Mendes Rocha Escrig (born 16 June 1982 in Uibaí). In 2017, the duo's album competed in the category [[Latin Grammy Award for Best Sertaneja Music Album]].
